title: Monday's highlights on TV
text: Monday, October 12, 2015, 12:01 a.m. Mondays highlights on TV include:The new musical comedy Crazy Ex-Girlfriend just might be a crazy good time. Rachel Bloom shines as a successful, but unhappy, New York lawyer who moves across the country to win back her former summer camp sweetheart. Oh, and she breaks into song every now and then. 8 p.m., The CWHow do you improve upon near perfection? Fargo, one of last years most impressive TV achievements, tries to do just that with a whole new story, new time period and a great new cast that includes Kirsten Dunst, Patrick Wilson, Jesse Plemons, Jean Smart and Ted Danson. 10 p.m., FX From Herald news services
